luxury.producerDescription: A hard working {{this}} produces {{item}} to improve quality of life.
luxury.itemDescription: {{this}} is used to improve the standards of life for workers.

generation.producerDescription: A hard working {{this}} produces {{item}} to be further refined and power the economy.
generation.itemDescription: {{this}} is the base material for production.

refinement.producerDescription: A hard working {{this}} produces {{item}} to build more complex goods and items.
refinement.itemDescription: {{this}} is the primary material used to make goods.

tools.producerDescription: A hard working {{this}} produces {{item}} to manufacture more complex goods.
tools.itemDescription: {{this}} increases the production rates and allows for the gathering & generation of more complex materials.

tradeGoods.producerDescription: A hard working {{this}} produces {{item}} for sale to other markets.
tradeGoods.itemDescription: {{this}} is sold to other more advanced settlements for a profit.
